tns:patch.author: Dolghier Constantin
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_ni_donor_orgsacronyms AS SELECT d.amp_activity_id, orgs.org_acronym AS org_acronym, orgs.org_id AS org_id, d.terms_assist_id, d.financing_instrument_id, d.donor_org_id, d.mode_of_payment_id, d.funding_status_id, d.agreement_id, d.funding_id FROM v_ni_donor_orgs d JOIN ni_all_orgs_dimension orgs ON orgs.org_id = d.org_id;
